text: Lenox is a town in Berkshire County, Massachusetts, United States. The population was 5,095 at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== * A History of Lenox, Massachusetts * History of Lenox, Massachusetts Category:Towns in Massachusetts Category:Berkshire County, Massachusetts Category:1750 establishments Category:1750s establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:18th-century establishments in Massachusetts
title: Lenox, Massachusetts
